name: Playlist-Builder
description: This web-app uses the Deezer music API to allow users to create their own playlists

name: Employee Manager
description: This is a simple CLI application which allows users to manage their database of employees through SQL and node.js

name: Readme Generator
description: This is another CLI application that I have made, it allows users to create a Readme for their newly developed application. The application prompts the user with a series of questions, and creates a brand new, markdown-supported, Readme file.

name: Campify
description: This web-app uses the RIDB API to gather information about camping, hiking, and other outdoor activities near the user's current location(using google geolocation API)

name: Employee Summary App
description: This is a CLI app that allows users to add employees to their database through prompts, and then be able to see all their employees rendered onto the webpage that is created.

name: Group Project 3
description: This app has yet to be developed
